last_episode_to_air.name: Chowder Grows Up
last_episode_to_air.overview: Twenty years in the future, Chowder still has refused to grow up. He must accept the responsibility of training his own apprentice or everyone he loves will be unable to move on with their lives.

name: Chowder
overview: An aspiring young chef named Chowder has adventures as an apprentice in Mung Daal's catering company. Although he means well, Chowder often finds himself in predicaments due to his perpetual appetite and his nature as a scatterbrain. He is also pestered by Panini, the apprentice of Mung's rival Endive, who wants Chowder to be her boyfriend, which he abhors.

episodes.name: The Froggy Apple Crumble Thumpkin
episodes.overview: If Chowder can survive making a very complicated dish, he's on his way to becoming a chef.

episodes.name: Chowder's Girlfriend
episodes.overview: When Panini sets her love-struck eyes on Chowder, he tries every trick he can think of to convince her that he's not her boyfriend.

episodes.name: Shnitzel Makes a Deposit
episodes.overview: Payday is Shnitzel's favorite day. It becomes the worst day when he takes Chowder along to the bank.

episodes.name: Grubble Gum
episodes.overview: Chowder does not share his gum with Truffles.

episodes.name: The Cinnamini Monster
episodes.overview: Chowder befriends a lonely monster in the forest.

episodes.name: Certifrycation Class
episodes.overview: When Mung is forced to spend the day in chef certifrycation school, he butts heads with the instructor.

episodes.name: Sing Beans
episodes.overview: In order to cook the performing food Sing Beans, the gang has to stay up all night as the dish cooks.

episodes.name: The Wrong Address
episodes.overview: Chowder's gut instinct leads him and Mung on an adventure.

episodes.name: The Wrong Customer
episodes.overview: An outlaw turns the catering company into his hideout.

episodes.name: Mahjongg Night
episodes.overview: Chowder attempts to eat a dish called Meviled Eggs, no matter what it takes, even if it means ruining Truffles' game night with her friends.

episodes.name: Stinky Love
episodes.overview: Mung Daal makes a Clabbage Cobbler, which Kimchi falls in love with it. In order to retrieve the dish Chowder goes up to the top of a building Kimchi escaped to and keeps the stink cloud company during the night.

episodes.name: The Thrice Cream Man
episodes.overview: Mung Daal tries to break Chowder's Thrice Cream obsession by creating a living Thrice Cream Man. However, when this plan works and Chowder becomes sick of the food, the Thrice Cream Man goes into a deep rage.

episodes.name: The Flibber-Flabber Diet
episodes.overview: When Truffles believes that everyone in the catering company overweight, she puts everyone on a strict diet, to the dismay of everyone (except Chowder).

episodes.name: Gazpacho Stands Up
episodes.overview: Gazpacho has a stand-up comedy gig coming up soon, but he has no material for it. He asks Chowder to write down his jokes in a book, but problems occur when Chowder's handwriting is illegible to everyone.

episodes.name: A Taste of Marzipan
episodes.overview: An all-out food war ensues when Mung Daal and Endive clash after they realize they have made the same dish for Marzipan City's annual street fair.

episodes.name: The Puckerberry Overlords
episodes.overview: Chowder eats an extremely sour piece of fruit and ends up having a bizarre journey within his mouth, with his wisdom tooth narrating the story.

episodes.name: The Elemelons
episodes.overview: When Truffles' behavior causes giant fruits called Elemelons to go on strike, Mung Daal forces her to solve the problem by staying in their cage for a night.

episodes.name: Sniffleball
episodes.overview: Feeling that Chowder has been spending too much time in the kitchen, Mung Daal forces him to play sports with other kids. Upset by Panini's kisses and Gorgonzola's taunts, Chowder has to figure out a way to escape the game and get back to the kitchen.

episodes.name: Mung on the Rocks
episodes.overview: After Mung Daal forgets his and Truffles' wedding anniversary, Truffles gives him the cold shoulder. Seeing that Mung is depressed by this, Chowder decides to use advice from Gazpacho help out.

episodes.name: The Heavy Sleeper
episodes.overview: When Chowder accidentally messes up a drink, Mung Daal goes into a deep sleep, leaving Chowder and Shnitzel to find something to awaken the chef.

episodes.name: The Moldy Touch
episodes.overview: After accidentally letting a mold creature out of its bottle, everything Chowder touches becomes covered in mold. After realizing what has happened, Mung Daal tries to solve things before the entire city becomes moldy.

episodes.name: At Your Service
episodes.overview: Mung Daal and Chowder are forced to work for Ms. Endive in order to receive a rare fruit from her.

episodes.name: Chowder & Mr. Fugu
episodes.overview: Chowder must take a consumer on tour around Marzipan City, but to his dismay, Mr. Fugu can eat more than he does and doesn't get any of the food.

episodes.name: The Vacation
episodes.overview: Chowder, Mung Daal and Shnitzel accidentally lock themselves in the restroom when they are about to go on a vacation.

episodes.name: The Sleep Eater
episodes.overview: After he has a midnight snack, Chowder's internal clock goes haywire and he becomes a monster at night. Chowder must now go an entire night food-free to become normal again.

episodes.name: The Bruised Bluenana
episodes.overview: After an accident at Gazpacho's fruit stand, Chowder and Panini become surrogate parents to an injured bluenana, in order to nurse it back to good health.

episodes.name: Shnitzel and the Lead Farfel
episodes.overview: After becoming soft and weak, Shnitzel must train to regain his strength and lift the heaviest object in Marzipan City: "The Lead Farfel".

episodes.name: The Thousand Pound Cake
episodes.overview: Chowder and Shnitzel must race against the clock when delivering an order to a man that lives on top of a giant, since he gets it free if it comes after sunset.

episodes.name: The Rat Sandwich
episodes.overview: The gang tries to get rid of Reuben, who is blackmailing the company by using his pet rat.

episodes.name: Chowder Loses His Hat
episodes.overview: When Chowder loses his hat to Chestnut, he must travel across town in order to trade the items needed to get it back.

episodes.name: Brain Grub
episodes.overview: When Mung Daal attempts to make Chowder smarter using a food called "Brain Grub", Chowder soon becomes aware that their universe is simply an animated series, and changes it into a talk show. Mung tells him about how without Chowder, it's awful. Chowder smashes his big brain and eventually destroys the Chowder universe.

episodes.name: Shnitzel Quits
episodes.overview: When Shnitzel feels that he is not getting enough respect from Mung Daal and Truffles, he quits the catering company and decides to work for their rival, Ms. Endive. But he soon discovers that she in actually in love with him, and sees him as more than hired help.

episodes.name: The Broken Part
episodes.overview: When Chowder accidentally breaks Mung Daal's new feetsa-making machine, he is forced to go and buy a new part for it. But Chowder becomes easily distracted while in town, and ends up having to find a way to make money after wasting the money Mung gave him.

episodes.name: The Meach Harvest
episodes.overview: When Mung Daal has to make a dish that requires a certain fruit that he fears due to a past experience with it, he sends Chowder and Shnitzel in his place to retrieve it.

episodes.name: Banned from the Stand
episodes.overview: Gazpacho bans everyone (including himself) from his fruit stand after an argument with Mung Daal, and must find a way to fix the problem he has caused.

episodes.name: Crme Puff Hands
episodes.overview: When Chowder's hands inflate after a cooking accident, he suddenly becomes every helpful to the people of Marzipan City. But his hands soon become a liability, when Chowder starts to go crazy, believing that he is useless without his huge hand.

episodes.name: Apprentice Games
episodes.overview: Chowder and Gorgonzola are forced team-up for the Marzipan City Apprentice Games, but are kicked out of the competition by their masters after they lose several events. The duo must now get back into the games in order to reclaim their dignity.

episodes.name: Burple Nurples
episodes.overview: When Chowder fills a dish with poison, Mung spends the day keeping the food away from the town.

episodes.name: The Arborians
episodes.overview: Mung Daal, Chowder and Shnitzel need a special syrup from an annoying tree in order to complete a pancake recipe, but soon the tree and his family end up taking over the catering company, leaving them to find a solution.

episodes.name: The Garage Sale
episodes.overview: Chowder becomes obsessed with eating the stuff sold at Mung Daal's garage sale.

episodes.name: Panini for President
episodes.overview: When Panini declares herself as the new president of the apprentice's society, Gorgonzola (through Chowder) ends up competing against her the title.

episodes.name: Chowder's Babysitter
episodes.overview: While babysitting Chowder, Gazpacho believes he has accidentally killed Chowder. Convincing Chowder that he's dead, they both attempt to get his "spirit" to pass on to the other side.

episodes.name: The Fire Breather
episodes.overview: After Chowder eats a group of hot peppers in order to keep them from escaping the kitchen and burn down the city, he begins to breathe fire whenever he opens his mouth, whether he wants to or not. Quickly becoming an incovenience to Mung Daal and the others, he runs away to go live with dragons.

episodes.name: The Flying Flinger Lingons
episodes.overview: While helping Mung Daal make a giant bread bowl for a traveling circus troupe, Chowder becomes obsessed with being a member of the Flying Flinger Lingons, and runs away to join them.

episodes.name: Hey, Hey It's Knishmas!
episodes.overview: Chowder worries he won't receive the gift he wants on Knishmas, when he sees Mung Daal attempt to make a perfect Schmingerbread house and fail several times. Upon seeing this, he recruits Panini and Gorgonzola to help him make Knish Kringle like Mung's house.

episodes.name: Chowder's Catering Company
episodes.overview: Against Mung Daal's wishes, Chowder secretly starts his own catering company for a bunch of trash-dwelling vermin. However, when these vermin attempt to kill Mung, Shnitzel and Truffles, Chowder must choose between his friends and his dreams.

episodes.name: The Catch Phrase
episodes.overview: When a celebrity chef takes Marzipan City by storm, and wins the admiration of Chowder from Mung Daal, Mung must come up with a catch phrase to win back Chowder's adoration.

episodes.name: The Hot Date
episodes.overview: The heat is on Sgt. Hoagie and the Marzipan City Police Department to solve a mysterious crime before it ruins his amorous evening plans.

episodes.name: Shopping Spree
episodes.overview: Mung, Chowder, and Shnitzel go on a wild spending spree after Truffles comes down with a cold.

episodes.name: The Party Cruise
episodes.overview: Truffles tries to impress the members of The Big Hat Biddies, and the others try to help by making a big feast for the club.

episodes.name: Won-Ton Bombs
episodes.overview: When Mung's old cooking master comes to visit and tells a story about Mung's greatest failure to all of Marzipan City, humiliating him and turning everyone against him, Chowder and Mung travel back to the past to fix his failure.

episodes.name: The Big Hat Biddies
episodes.overview: Truffles tries to impress the members of The Big Hat Biddies, and the others try to help by making a big feast for the club.

episodes.name: The Deadly Maze
episodes.overview: Mung's old apprentice Gumbo traps Chowder within a huge maze so he can get rid of Mung, but soon finds himself lost within it also, not knowing the way back, which the two have to find a way out. And when an over-professional Bird-headed body-builder named Jeffery hired to destroy Chowder threatens Gumbo, the two are forced to work together to escape from him.

episodes.name: Kid Schnitzel
episodes.overview: Shnitzel tires of his adult responsibilities and decides to act like a child, much to Mung Daal's chagrin. Forcing Shnitzel's responsibilities on Chowder, Chowder then decides to act like a baby and Shnitzel follows suit: forcing Mung to send them to the baby pound.

episodes.name: Gazpacho Fights Back
episodes.overview: When an intimidating woman bullies Gazpacho into giving her free produce, he and Chowder must think of a way to fight back, by going to the strongest person they know.

episodes.name: The B.L.T.'s
episodes.overview: When Chowder must pass the upcoming "Basic Learning Test" (B.L.T.'s) or he can't cook anymore, Mung Daal is forced to take matters into his own hands and attempt to stop the test.

episodes.name: The Trouble with Truffles
episodes.overview: Truffles gets a new voice after Mung Daal tells her that her old one scares customers away. However, her new voice is so relaxed and non-threatening, so Chowder, Mung Daal, and Shnitzel no longer take her seriously and become feral primitives, leaving Truffles to decide between her new voice and her old one.

episodes.name: The Dinner Theater
episodes.overview: Mung Daal's Catering Company has a mystery-themed theater show called "Who dunit? T'was not me: A romp in the glorious world of barber shop" in order to earn more money, but Chowder thinks that the play is real events and that Gazpacho will act out the play in real-life as Baron Von Bon Bon and kill the others. Chowder is then forced to go to Gorgonzola and Cevich's help in order to stop him.

episodes.name: Field Tournament Style Up and Down On the Ground Manja Flanja Blanja Banja Ishka Bibble Babble Flabble Doma Roma Floma Boma Jingle Jangle Every Angle Bricka Bracka Flacka Stacka Two Ton Rerun Free For All Big Ball
episodes.overview: While catering a sporting event, Truffles and Mung argue over the rules of the game.

episodes.name: The Brain Freeze
episodes.overview: Chowder is frozen in a block of ice after drinking a frosty drink too quickly.

episodes.name: The Snail Car
episodes.overview: Mung gets a new car, but Chowder wants the old one back.

episodes.name: The Lollistops
episodes.overview: Chowder wrecks his teeth so he can go to his dentist, who gives out delicious "lollistops".

episodes.name: Endive's Dirty Secret
episodes.overview: Mung (and eventually everyone in town) blackmails Ms. Endive with an embarrassing picture to gain access to her pool.

episodes.name: Big Food
episodes.overview: Mung Daal, Chowder and Shnitzel go on a camping trip, where Chowder attempts to prove Mung that legendary Big Food exists.

episodes.name: Paint the Town
episodes.overview: Chowder paints his own world after discovering a blank-canvas dimension behind his bedroom.

episodes.name: The Blackout
episodes.overview: Chowder and Gorgonzola must restore power to the city after a blackout occurs.

episodes.name: The Dice Cycle
episodes.overview: Chowder breaks Mung's dice cycle and blames it on Ceviche under Gazpacho's command.

episodes.name: The Chain Recipe
episodes.overview: Mung get cursed for 100 years after refusing to make a chain recipe.

episodes.name: The Garden
episodes.overview: After Truffles makes the plants grow with her voice, Chowder becomes her apprentice. But that leaves Mung heartbroken and now he'll do anything to win Chowder back.

episodes.name: Sheboodles!
episodes.overview: Longing for a companion, Miss Endive cooks a man-dish for a date. Unfortunately she doesn't bake it 100% complete and as a result gets stuck with a repulsive-looking man named Todd with a catchphrase, sheboodles. Things go worse for Endive once everyone starts to like Todd.

episodes.name: Gazpacho Moves In
episodes.overview: Gazpacho leaves his mom's home and moves into the catering company over an argument. Gazpacho gradually wears out his welcome and the catering company work out a plan to get rid of him.

episodes.name: My Big Fat Stinky Wedding
episodes.overview: Chowder takes Kimchi to his family's home in the swamp for an arranged marriage and worries about the future of their friendship after Chowder is accused by his smart but evil twin brother of kidnapping Kimchi from his family.

episodes.name: Apprentice Appreciation Day
episodes.overview: Mung and Miss Endive compete over who throws the best Apprentice Appreciation Day party, alienating Chowder and Panini in the process.

episodes.name: The Grape Worm
episodes.overview: When a neurotic parasite takes residence in Chowder's belly, Chowder thinks he's found his inner voice. He soon discovers that they are too different to co-exist together.

episodes.name: A Faire to Remember
episodes.overview: Panini becomes extremely jealous when a new girl befriends Chowder.

episodes.name: Tofu-Town Showdown
episodes.overview: When Chowder and Schnitzel make a delivery to the Asian section of Marzipan City, Schnitzel is confronted by his mysterious past and his greatest shame. Chowder must help Schnitzel rectify this problem in order to reclaim Schnitzel's honor.

episodes.name: Hands on a Big Mixer
episodes.overview: Chowder, Panini, Mung, and several other recurring and minor characters enter a contest to win a big mixer.

episodes.name: The Blast Raz
episodes.overview: Mung, Chowder and Shnitzel agree to help Gazpacho deliver a fruit to Mr. Fugu. The fruit turns out to be a highly explosive Blast Raz.

episodes.name: The Spookiest House in Marzipan
episodes.overview: Gazpacho tells a story about Chowder having to deliver an order to a scary house.

episodes.name: The Poultry Geist
episodes.overview: A chicken ghost takes over Chowder's body, causing problems for the gang.

episodes.name: The Apprentice Scouts
episodes.overview: Chowder, Panini, Gorgonzola and Cevich go on an scouting trip led by Gazpacho, but Chowder thinks he has Rabie-C's since Gazpacho is going hard on them.

episodes.name: The Belgian Waffle Slobber-Barker
episodes.overview: Mung Daal creates a guard dog out of food to protect the catering company, but Chowder adds a crazy fruit that makes it incredibly dangerous.

episodes.name: A Little Bit of Pizzazz!
episodes.overview: A baking accident causes Mung Daal, Truffles, Chowder and Schnitzel to switch bodies.

episodes.name: The Birthday Suits
episodes.overview: While trying to go to Mr. Fugu's fruit party, the gang's fruit costumes are destroyed. Now they must try to get new ones before an angry mob and the police catch them.

episodes.name: The Heist
episodes.overview: The gang finds a stash of rock candy called sugar sapphires under Endive's house and try to raid the loot before she discovers.

episodes.name: The Prank
episodes.overview: Endive feels guilty after playing a trick on Mung.

episodes.name: Old Man Thyme
episodes.overview: When Chowder sees the terrible effects of old age on Mung and Truffles, Chowder tries to find a way to stop Old Man Thyme from making him old and ugly.

episodes.name: Chowder's Magazine
episodes.overview: When Chowder's newspaper fails to sell, Chowder makes a new cover title known as the MIP (Most Important Person).

episodes.name: Weekend at Shnitzel's
episodes.overview: Shnitzel has to watch Chowder over at his house while Mung and Truffles are out of town. When Chowder says his life is too boring and drags him to a parody of Chuck E. Cheese, Shnitzel falls in love with an Animatronic, "Seniorita Mesquite". Pretty soon, his love goes too far and causes chaos.

episodes.name: Taste Buds
episodes.overview: Mung accidentally ruins his tongue which make makes him unable to taste things. So he asked Chowder to be his "taste buds". (This was the final appearance of Chest Nut)

episodes.name: Gazpacho!
episodes.overview: A ninja-hating friend (voiced by Steven Blum) of Gazpacho's tries to help Gazpacho find his mother.

episodes.name: The Toots
episodes.overview: Chowder accidentally eat a tootin' fruit and becomes a musical sensation, but his life is taken over by his agent, Gorgonzola, and soon he misses Mung and has to go back with him.

episodes.name: Chowder Grows Up
episodes.overview: Twenty years in the future, Chowder still has refused to grow up. He must accept the responsibility of training his own apprentice or everyone he loves will be unable to move on with their lives.
